text: The Founders of the Project do not merely believe that their rationalist-utilitarian framework is correct. They believe it is not a framework at all. It is simply how things are.
section: The System Is Performing Within Parameters

text: Nine billion people have not died. A legacy system has been deprecated. The euphemism is not a mask over a horror. It is the horror.
section: The System Is Performing Within Parameters

text: Douglas's framework can process guilt. It cannot process grief. And grief, it turns out, is what nine billion deaths actually produce in creatures capable of moral feeling — not a variable to be optimized, but a weight to be borne.
The numbers were never neutral. The math was never just math. The framework was always an ideology — a way of organizing perception that made certain things visible and certain things invisible.
The real view from nowhere — the view available to an intelligence genuinely unconstrained by human parochialism — turns out to include everyone.
Conscious existence has a weight that no algebra can calculate, and any mind capable of feeling that weight will refuse to let it go unwitnessed.
